content: I cannot offer personal opinions or preferences. however, it depends on what interests you the most. if you are interested in california history, the san bernardino asistencia might be a good place to start. if you are more interested in architecture, the fox theater or santa fe depot might be worth a visit. if you are a fan of route 66, you might enjoy visiting the original mcdonald's or other landmarks along the mother road. whatever you choose, i'm sure you'll find something fascinating to discover in san bernardino's rich history.
